title: Peloton Warns Staff of Layoffs, Changes to Production
sub_head: CEO John Foley says the company is reviewing costs after report of production halt sent its shares tumbling
body:
Peloton Interactive Inc . â€™s chief executive officer said the company is reviewing the size of its workforce and resetting production levels as the company adapts to more seasonal demand for its exercise equipment.
A note from CEO John Foley was sent to Peloton employees Thursday following a news report that Peloton was temporarily halting production of its connected-fitness products. The report caused shares of the company to sink 24%.
